it.polimi.se2019.view

Class ChosenActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.view.ChosenActions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ChosenActions
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    this class is going to send back the objects it received to "select" them. It's meant to encapsulate the player's choices, asking it which of the available actions it wants to perform
    See Also:
